item.title: Cherry Studio
item.description: 支持多服务商集成的 AI 对话客户端

item.title: Icon Maker by Raycast
item.description:
This repository contains the source code for ray.so, a collection of tools built by Raycast. It includes:

  • Code Images: Create beautiful images of your code.
  • Icon Maker: Create beautiful icons for Raycast Extensions.
  • Prompt Explorer: Explore AI Prompts for Raycast.
  • Preset Explorer: Explore AI Presets for Raycast.
  • Quicklink Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Quicklinks.
  • Snippet Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Snippets.
  • Theme Explorer: Browse and import Raycast Themes.

项目地址#

https://github.com/raycast/ray-so

item.title: 官方示例
item.description:
官方教程#

  • SwiftUI Tutorials
    • https://developer.apple.com/tutorials/swiftui/
    • Landmarks
    • SwiftUI essentials
      • Views
      • Lists and navigation
      • Handling user input
    • Drawing and animation
    • App design and layout
    • Framework intergration
      • UIKit
      • watchOS
      • macOS
  • SwiftUI Concepts Tutorial
    • https://developer.apple.com/tutorials/swiftui-concepts
  • Simple Apps Tutorials
    • https://developer.apple.com/tutorials/sample-apps
  • Develop apps for Apple platforms
    • https://developer.apple.com/tutorials/app-dev-training
  • Develop in Swift Tutorials
    • https://developer.apple.com/tutorials/develop-in-swift

Sample Code#

模块 项目名称 关联文档
SwiftUI WritingApp Building a document-based app with SwiftUI
SwiftData SwiftDataFlashCardSample Building a document-based app using SwiftData
CoreData / SwiftData SampleTrips Adopting SwiftData for a Core Data app
CoreData CoreDataCloudKitShare Sharing Core Data objects between iCloud users
CloudKit https://github.com/apple?q=cloudkit-sample&type=repository https://developer.apple.com/icloud/cloudkit/
SwiftUI / visionOS Destination Video https://developer.apple.com/documentation/visionos/destination-video
UIKit Supporting multiple windows on iPad https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/supporting-multiple-windows-on-ipad
SwiftUI Creating custom container views https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/creating-custom-container-views
SwiftUI - Navigation Bringing robust navigation structure to your SwiftUI app https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/bringing-robust-navigation-structure-to-your-swiftui-app
SwiftData Filtering and sorting persistent data https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftdata/filtering-and-sorting-persistent-data
AVFAudio Capturing stereo audio from built-In microphones https://developer.apple.com/documentation/avfaudio/capturing-stereo-audio-from-built-in-microphones
SwiftUI - Layouts Composing custom layouts with SwiftUI https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/composing_custom_layouts_with_swiftui
